A square shield is a decorative shield that can be built in the decoration space of the throne room and treasure room in a player-owned house. It is painted with a heraldic crest identical to those featured on other painted shields. The square shield is made of teak, a hard wood which is susceptible to cracking and is thus not suitable for use in shield-making. As a result, it is solely decorative, and cannot be equipped. It requires 76 Construction to build and, when built, grants 360 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it.

The appearance of the decoration is dependent on the player's heraldry, which can be changed speaking to Sir Renitee.

A '''square shield''' is a decorative shield that can be built in the [[decoration space]] of the [[throne room]] and [[treasure room]] in a [[player-owned house]]. It is painted with a [[Sir_Renitee#Heraldry_for_crest|heraldic crest]] identical to those featured on other [[Heraldic_kiteshield_(Construction)|painted shields]]. The square shield is made of [[teak]], a hard wood which is susceptible to cracking and is thus not suitable for use in shield-making. As a result, it is solely decorative, and cannot be equipped. It requires 76 [[Construction]] to build and, when built, grants 360 [[experience]]. The player must have a [[hammer]] and a [[saw]] in their inventory to build it.

The appearance of the decoration is dependent on the player's heraldry, which can be changed speaking to [[Sir Renitee]].
